titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable, Sr. Thomas Stampe, Lord Mayor the Court of Alderman, and citizens of London, September 29th. 1692, at the election of the Lord Mayor for the year ensuing / by William Smythies ...
titleStmt.author: Smythies, William, d. 1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
